control.name: ec_uart_cmd
control.doc: Set to send command to EC UART. Get to obtain the matched results with the regular expression of ec_uart_regexp.

control.name: ec_uart_multicmd
control.doc: Set to send multiple commands to EC UART.

control.name: ec_uart_regexp
control.doc: List of regular expressions which matches the response of ec_uart_cmd.

control.name: ec_uart_stream
control.doc: Ec uart stream collected while ec_uart_capture is set to 'on'

control.name: ec_uart_timeout
control.doc: Timeout value for waiting EC UART response of issuing an EC command.

control.name: ec_board
control.doc: The board name of the EC image

control.name: cpu_uart_cmd
control.doc: Set to send command to CPU UART. Get to obtain the matched results with the regular expression of cpu_uart_regexp.

control.name: cpu_uart_regexp
control.doc: List of regular expressions which matches the response of cpu_uart_cmd.

control.name: cpu_uart_stream
control.doc: Cpu uart stream collected while cpu_uart_capture is set to 'on'

control.name: cpu_uart_timeout
control.doc: Timeout value for waiting CPU UART response of issuing an EC command.
